name: Shadow Box Frame - Medium
description:
These 8x10 shadow boxes are perfect little additions to many different areas of a home.
This frame comes in both black and white and is available in all different designs and colours. 
To put your child's name please email though his or her name and chosen shape or add it to the notes field.
The following shapes are currently available to order:
Girls - Owls, Butterflies, Teddies, Ballerinas
Boys - Planes, Trains, Cars, Sailboats

Please email me at admin@cinnamondust.com or find me on facebook to see the full range of frame designs.
You can also 'Like' my facebook page to keep up to date with currently available frames

Please note:
This frame is shown as a display only to allow for purchase and postage.
Please allow an additional 3-5 working days if you would like a frame custom made.

name: Single Vanilla Scented Fabric Pear
description:
Whether in the kitchen, dining or settled on a dresser these pears are just right to add that special touch that makes every a house a home. 
They make a great gift, provided you can bear to part with them!  
All of these gorgeous  pears help to create a house that is both inviting and stylish with their good looks and sweet vanilla scent. 
Each pear is approximatley 10cm x 10cm.
Please enjoy free postage with this item.

name: Set of 3 Pears
description:
Whether in the kitchen, dining or settled on a dresser these pears are just right to add that special touch that makes every a house a home.   
The pears look great individually or in large groups and add loads of charm, style and a delightful vanilla fragrance to any room. And they are so pretty!  
They are a lovely treat for yourself or gift for someone special and compliment a range of decor.  These gorgeous pears help to create a house that is both inviting and stylish with their good looks and sweet vanilla scent. They make a great addition to a child's room as a beautiful display and are terrific to place near a change table (they are not intended as a toy but are ornamental). Only a limited number of this beautiful pear  have been created  making them extra special! 
These pears are approx. 10cm x10cm and are made from cotton material.
